= [XeniaPackageV2#Install_Notes Install Notes]=

Run the following sql in the following order against your database

[http://nautilus.baruch.sc.edu/twiki_dmcc/pub/Main/XeniaPackageV2/db_xenia_v2_simple_schema.sql Xenia V2 Postgres main schema]

[http://www.carocoops.org/obskml/microwfs/obs.sql Observation data dictionary lookups]

Note in the above sql file there is the below commented SELECT statement which will give a more human readable listing of the observation data dictionary

{{{select t1.row_id,t2.standard_name,t3.standard_name from m_scalar_type t1,obs_type t2,uom_type t3 where t1.obs_type_id = t2.row_id and t1.uom_type_id = t3.row_id;}}}


[http://www.carocoops.org/obskml/microwfs/display_order.sql Display order lookups]
